alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Lower Snake River Plain; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 12:30PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...POCKETS OF FREEZING RAIN AFFECTING THE UPPER SNAKE PLAIN AND TETON VALLEY REGION... At 1224 PM MDT, freezing rain was reported on surface observations and regional webcams in the Rexburg/Tetonia area mixing in with snow showers. Wind gusts as high as 60 mph have also been observed along ID-33 leading to a road closure per ITD due to blowing and drifting snow. Lingering rain and snow showers will continue to track east as winds subside later this afternoon and especially this evening. Motorists are encouraged to be mindful of areas of black ice and slippery road conditions in the area. For the latest road conditions, call 511 or visit 511.idaho.gov. Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, Rexburg, Rigby, Driggs, Ashton, Swan Valley, Felt, Ririe Reservoir, Marysville, Lorenzo, Ammon, Shelley, Victor, Iona, Sugar City, Ucon, Menan, Teton, Ririe and Roberts.
